name: Crossword Cryptogram Solver iPhone
description:
Solve Cryptograms, Crosswords, Hangman, and Wheel of Fortune type puzzles easily.
This is a missing letter possibilities finder rather than a crosswords dictionary. You can solve for repXace and dispXace where they intersect in a puzzle.
You can test your favorite quotes as cryptograms simply by typing them in converting to ALL CAPS and solving. The program treats anything in all caps as a cryptogram.
Although the solutions are limited by a time out and character limit (to prevent huge solutions from tying up your device) you can cut cryptograms down and solve for small sections.
Cryptograms can have up to 30 unique words.
